price: 21. Xus (reer) Caad walaalkood9, markuu ugu digey qolodiisii Al-Axqaaf (Buur ciideedda) dhab ahaanna digayaal baa la soo diray hortiis isaga iyo gadaashiiba (isagoo leh): Ha caabudina waxaan ahayn Allaah; waxaan anigu idiinka cabsan Cadaab Maalin Daran.
arabic: ۞ وَٱذۡكُرۡ أَخَا عَادٍ إِذۡ أَنذَرَ قَوۡمَهُۥ بِٱلۡأَحۡقَافِ وَقَدۡ خَلَتِ ٱلنُّذُرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦٓ أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur akhā ʿādin idh andhara qawmahu bil-aḥqāfi waqad khalati al-nudhuru min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
